Title: Relates to school resource officers
Summary: Establishes a school resource officer unit within the division of state police; permits every school district within the state to request the placement of a member of such unit at any building, structure or facility primarily used for the instruction of students located within such district.
LawCode: Add ยง236, Exec L; add ยง2801-c, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the education law, in relation to school resource officers
